description: HTTP TRACE method is enabled on the Apache server - potential security vulnerability allowing cross-site tracing (XST) attacks to access sensitive headers like cookies and authorization tokens
notes: Confirmed via OPTIONS request showing Allow header contains TRACE method. The TRACE method is enabled which can be used in cross-site tracing (XST) attacks to access sensitive headers. This should be disabled in production environments by adding 'TraceEnable Off' to Apache configuration. CVSS Score: 3.7 (Medium severity).
